interestingcomments.content: L Bracket /!/ I was given a Really Right Stuff L Bracket as a birthday present for my Nikon D7200 and I am extremely happy with it. I don't normally take pictures in portrait mode however even in landscape orientation I find the bracket useful. The reason being is that it was designed for the D7200 while my old quick release plate for the tripod is a standard plate designed for all cameras. Being a universal plate I found it easily came lose while the L bracket is extremely secure.  I don't know if I will be inspired to try and take more pictures in mode but I do think it is a great tripod accessory .
